query:
UPDATE doits
            SET
                name = COALESCE($2, name),
                description = COALESCE($3, description),
                is_public = COALESCE($4, is_public),
                alternative_name = COALESCE($5, alternative_name),
                affects_to = COALESCE($6, affects_to),
                deadlined_at = COALESCE($7, deadlined_at)
            WHERE id = $1
